description: Israel started bombing the Palestinian territory after coming under attack from Hamas on 7 October.
maintext: The heads of organisations including Unicef, the WHO and the World Food Programme - as well as charities such as Save the Children - have described the "horrific" loss of life on both sides. They have also released a statement to demand the unconditional release of the hostages taken by Hamas during its 7 October attacks.
title: Israel Gaza war: Hamas-run health ministry says Gaza death toll passes 10,000
